# Gapminder Dataset Analysis

This Gapminder dataset provides values for life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population, every five years, from 1952 to 2007.

Included in this website are pages with analyses on the relationship between life expectancy & GDP per capita across countries, life expectancy & population across countries, and an analysis of the changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita and population of South Korea overtime.

- [Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita](life-gdp.qmd)
- [Life Expectancy and Population](life-population.qmd)
- [Country Analysis](country.qmd)
